text:
Created attachment 33729
Jmeter_PostPocessor_Sequence_Error

I have 2 post processors(Regular expression and BSF) and an assertion(Response) under a request.
Also I have a 'JSR223 Post Processor' which is applicable for all the requests.

I expect to get the post processors and assertion under the request to be executed immediately after the request. But currently 'JSR223 Post Processor' which is at the global level, is getting executed before request level post processors and assertions.

Please see the attached snapshot for reference. Current behavior is in red and expected is in green.

Please let me know if you need more details.
creator: rkkreddy@gmail.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.
Please subscribe to JMeter user list and ask there.
Note that Post-Ps are called after *every* sampler in scope. 
Check your samplers.
